txt.en: 'Forgive me, [placeholder]. This is exactly Lady Vanyalos's dream, as she told it to me: a [placeholder], looking as you, coming up this road under a strangely darkened sky. The description fits exactly!\n\n'Lady Vanyalos will want to speak with you, and at once! You can find her within her hall on the north-east rise. I do not pretend to understand how this can be, but she will certainly be filled with wonder at seeing her dream made flesh. What can this mean?'
Talk to Lady Vanyalos in her hall on the north-east rise of Imloth Melui
Lady Vanyalos can be found in the great hall on the north-east rise of Imloth Melui.\n\nMerenir has asked you to pay a visit to Lady Vanyalos, insisting that somehow she dreamed of you.

'Welcome to Imloth Melui, good traveller. Captain Merenir believes it was you I saw in my dream? Are you the only traveller of your kind who will visit us during this strange darkness, I wonder? Will Merenir send me every one who does? He is a good captain but perhaps not the best interpreter of dreams.\n\n'Still, it is true and well known that I and those of my blood have had dreams of great portent. Are you a bearer of good tidings, [placeholder], or ill? And if you were, would you know the difference?'
It seems that your appearance and the timing of your arrival in Imloth Melui bears a striking resemblance to a dream Lady Vanyalos had the night before.
